description: Perform quick addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. Streamline numeric workflows with fast, reliable results. Reduce errors and save time on everyday calculations.

capabilities.name: add
capabilities.description: Add two numbers and return the sum.

capabilities.name: sub
capabilities.description: Subtract the second number from the first.

capabilities.name: mul
capabilities.description: Multiply two numbers and return the product.

capabilities.name: div
capabilities.description: Divide two numbers and return floating point division
